traits.label: name
traits.name: :name
traits.desc: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms submitted directly to a URL

traits.label: size
traits.name: :size
traits.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

traits.label: model-value
traits.name: :model-value
traits.desc: Model of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive

traits.label: val
traits.name: :val
traits.desc: Works when model ('value') is Array. It tells the component which value should add/remove when ticked/unticked

traits.label: true-value
traits.name: :true-value
traits.desc: What model value should be considered as checked/ticked/on?

traits.label: false-value
traits.name: :false-value
traits.desc: What model value should be considered as unchecked/unticked/off?

traits.label: indeterminate-value
traits.name: :indeterminate-value
traits.desc: What model value should be considered as 'indeterminate'?

traits.label: toggle-order
traits.name: :toggle-order
traits.desc: Determines toggle order of the two states ('t' stands for state of true, 'f' for state of false); If 'toggle-indeterminate' is true, then the order is: indet -> first state -> second state -> indet (and repeat), otherwise: indet -> first state -> second state -> first state -> second state -> ...

traits.label: toggle-indeterminate
traits.name: :toggle-indeterminate
traits.desc: When user clicks/taps on the component, should we toggle through the indeterminate state too?

traits.label: label
traits.name: :label
traits.desc: Label to display along the component (or use the default slot instead of this prop)
examples: I agree with the Terms and Conditions

traits.label: left-label
traits.name: :left-label
traits.desc: Label (if any specified) should be displayed on the left side of the component

traits.label: checked-icon
traits.name: :checked-icon
traits.desc: The icon to be used when the model is truthy (instead of the default design)

traits.label: unchecked-icon
traits.name: :unchecked-icon
traits.desc: The icon to be used when the toggle is falsy (instead of the default design)

traits.label: indeterminate-icon
traits.name: :indeterminate-icon
traits.desc: The icon to be used when the model is indeterminate (instead of the default design)

traits.label: color
traits.name: :color
traits.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: keep-color
traits.name: :keep-color
traits.desc: Should the color (if specified any) be kept when the component is unticked/ off?

traits.label: dark
traits.name: :dark
traits.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

traits.label: dense
traits.name: :dense
traits.desc: Dense mode; occupies less space

traits.label: disable
traits.name: :disable
traits.desc: Put component in disabled mode

traits.label: tabindex
traits.name: :tabindex
traits.desc: Tabindex HTML attribute value
